page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT IN ARBROATH.
page.content: {Entertainment}in Arbroath is not only for the locals but for the{tourists} who arrive in the summer.For the locals there are winter pool and darts leagues,live musical entertainment in the pubs,football on the West Links and at Gayfield,where Arbroath F.C. play,as well as the golf course and bowling club.Smokey's discotheque opens all year while Pleasureland opens in the summer months because a lot of their {trade }comes in the main from summer tourists and there are other pub and club discotheques as well.Smokey's has weekly teenager nights and children's nights so it caters for most of the younger{ {population}of the town.Considering the population of Arbroath there is a good spread of entertainment for all ages and tastes.
